prolog.author: Anna van Raaphorst
Richard Johnson
prolog.publisher: OASIS (Organization for the Advancement of Structured Information Standards)

keywords.indexterm: outputs supported by DITA Open Toolkit Eclipse help
targets supported by DITA Open Toolkit Eclipse help

section.p: Eclipse is a open-source platform-independent software framework for delivering "rich-client applications," as opposed to "thin-client" browser-based applications. Originally developed by IBM, Eclipse is now managed by the Eclipse Foundation, an independent not-for-profit consortium of software industry vendors. Eclipse help is one of the documentation sytem options available in the framework.
Eclipse help is one of the DITA Open Toolkit target outputs.
